metadata.description: Discover the world of currencies with The Exchange Corner, your leading app for swift and precise currency conversions. Obtain real-time exchange rates, choose from a wide variety of currencies, and effortlessly convert any amount. From dollars to euros, to yen to pounds, Mundo Divisas provides you with the essential tools to stay informed about fluctuations in the international financial market. With an intuitive interface and up-to-date data, your currency conversion experience has never been this easy and efficient. Explore the financial world with The Exchange Corner today!

errors.SAME_CURRENCIES: You can't compare the same currencies. Choose different currency codes
errors.NOT_VALID_CURRENCY: Conversion could not be performed due to invalid currency code

favorite-exchanges.title: Your favorite exchange rates
favorite-exchanges.empty: You haven't added favorite exchanges yet

errors.CURRENCY_EXCHANGE_RATE: There was an error getting the current exchange rate

daily.title: {from} to {to} exchange rate in the last 100 days
daily.subtitle: Last update

errors.FX_DAILY: There was an error getting the daily exchange history
errors.FX_MONTHLY: There was an error getting the annual exchange history
